name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Gary JONES, Petitioner

judges: Before NIX, C.J., and LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT, ZAPPALA, PAPADAKOS, JJ.
parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Gary JONES, Petitioner.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
AND NOW, this 27th day of July, 1988, the Order entered by this Court in the above matter on May 12, 1988, is rescinded, and the Petition for Review is hereby dismissed as moot.
LARSEN, J., dissents.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: Healey & Davidson, Pittsburgh, for petitioner Michael J. Healey.
Robert L. Eberhardt, Deputy Dist. Atty., Pittsburgh, for Com.
casebody.head_matter:
543 A.2d 1092
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Gary JONES, Petitioner.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued Nov. 12, 1987.
Decided July 27, 1988.
Healey & Davidson, Pittsburgh, for petitioner Michael J. Healey.
Robert L. Eberhardt, Deputy Dist. Atty., Pittsburgh, for Com.
Before NIX, C.J., and LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT, ZAPPALA, PAPADAKOS, JJ.
